pages.text: Various materials used throughout the mod. More pages will unlock as you progress.
$(item)Ferramic Gears$() are simply gears made of $(item)Ferramic$(), used in various recipes for machines or tools that grind things in some way.
$(item)Carbon Plates$() are plates made of carbon, as their name implies. More advanced machines and contraptions may require a few of those.
$(item)Enriched Fuel$() is a way to get more efficiency out of Coal, as the result burns more than the sum of its parts.
$(item)Inferno Fuel$() is an even more efficient Furnace fuel, which can be further refined by more advanced machines into $(item)Inferno Crystals$() then $(item)Aeternus Crystals$().
